params._whitelisted: array of boolen values to be mapped to the addresses
params._whitelistedAddresses: array of addresses to be added

drink(address).details: if restrictToWhitelisted is true, then check if the sender is whitelisted. if the restrictToMaxReq is true, then check if the sender is already received token.

isAllowedToDrink(address).details: it helps when contract is restricted to requests count.

isWhitelisted(address).details: it helps when contract is restricted to whitelisted addresses

params._cupSize: the amount that can be received by users

params._maxDrinkCount: the maximum number of times the drink function can be called

OWNER().notice: The owner who has privileged rights

addWhitelistedMultiple(address[],bool[]).notice: Add multiple addresses to the whitelisted list

isAllowedToDrink(address).notice: return true if the user request counts are less than or equal to maxDrinkCount, otherwise retuens false

isWhitelisted(address).notice: return true if the address is whitelisted, otherwise false

updateCupSize(uint256).notice: update the amount that can be received by users
